title: New Academic Year 2025-26 Registration Open
description: We are pleased to announce that registration for the new academic year 2025-26 is now open. Please find the application form and fee structure attached. Early registration is recommended as seats are limited.

title: Parent-Teacher Conference Schedule
description: The monthly parent-teacher conference is scheduled for September 15th, 2025. Parents are requested to book their slots in advance. Please refer to the schedule document for available time slots.

title: Mid-Term Examination Timetable Released
description: The mid-term examination timetable for all grades has been finalized and is now available for download. Students and parents are advised to review the schedule carefully.

title: Sports Day Event - Volunteer Registration
description: We are looking for parent volunteers for our annual Sports Day event scheduled for October 15th, 2025. Please find the volunteer registration form and event details in the attached documents.

title: Library Book Return Reminder
description: This is a reminder for all students to return their library books by September 10th, 2025. Late returns will incur a fine as per the library policy. Please check the attached list for outstanding books.

title: School Bus Route Changes - Effective Immediately
description: Due to road construction work, there will be temporary changes to bus routes 5, 7, and 12. Please review the updated routes and new pickup/drop-off times in the attached document.

title: Health and Safety Guidelines Update
description: Updated health and safety guidelines have been implemented across all school premises. All students, parents, and staff are required to review and follow these guidelines. The complete document is attached below.

title: Cultural Week Celebration - Activity Sign-ups Open
description: Our annual Cultural Week celebration is approaching! Students can now sign up for various activities including dance, music, drama, and art competitions. Registration deadline is September 5th, 2025.
